title: The First Video Game: Pong Released
description: Pong, one of the first commercially successful video games, was released by Atari.

title: Nintendo Entertainment System (NES) Launches
description: Nintendo introduced the NES, revolutionizing the home gaming market.

title: Tetris Released
description: The puzzle game Tetris was created by Alexey Pajitnov in the Soviet Union.

title: Game Boy Released by Nintendo
description: Nintendo's Game Boy handheld console was released, accompanied by Tetris.

title: Sony PlayStation Released
description: Sony entered the gaming industry with the launch of the PlayStation.

title: Pokémon Red and Blue Released
description: The Pokémon franchise began with the release of Pokémon Red and Blue in Japan.

title: Half-Life Revolutionizes First-Person Shooters
description: Valve's Half-Life set a new standard for storytelling in first-person shooters.

title: The Sims Released
description: Maxis released The Sims, a life simulation game that became a cultural phenomenon.

title: Xbox Launched by Microsoft
description: Microsoft launched the Xbox, marking its entry into the console gaming market.

title: World of Warcraft Launches
description: Blizzard released World of Warcraft, which became a massively popular MMORPG.

title: Nintendo Wii Released
description: Nintendo's Wii introduced motion controls and expanded gaming to new audiences.

title: Minecraft Initial Release
description: Markus Persson released the first version of Minecraft, a sandbox-building game.

title: Angry Birds Released
description: Rovio Entertainment released Angry Birds, a popular mobile game.

title: The Last of Us Released
description: Naughty Dog's The Last of Us redefined storytelling in gaming.

title: PlayStation 4 Released
description: Sony launched the PlayStation 4, dominating the eighth console generation.

title: Pokémon Go Takes Over the World
description: Niantic's Pokémon Go popularized augmented reality gaming on mobile devices.

title: Nintendo Switch Released
description: Nintendo's hybrid console Switch became a massive success.

title: Fortnite Battle Royale Released
description: Epic Games released Fortnite Battle Royale, reshaping online multiplayer gaming.

title: Among Us Gains Popularity
description: Among Us became a cultural phenomenon during the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: Elden Ring Released
description: FromSoftware's Elden Ring became a critically acclaimed open-world RPG.
